Class LoadMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.LoadMap

  • public class LoadMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handles the functionality of loading the map.

      • readMap

        public GameMap readMap(java.lang.String p_mapName)
        Reads the ".map" file and creates a GameMap object accordingly. Performs basic validation checks too.
        Parameters:
        p_mapName - Name of the map file to be read
        Returns:
        d_map GameMap object representing the map just read

      • readCountries

        private java.io.BufferedReader readCountries(java.io.BufferedReader p_reader)
        Reads the countries from the ".map" files. Exits the program if duplicate country or in non-existent country.
        Parameters:
        p_reader - Stream starting from countries section of ".map" file
        Returns:
        p_reader BufferedReader stream at the point where it has finished reading countries

      • readContinents

        private java.io.BufferedReader readContinents(java.io.BufferedReader p_reader)
        Reads the continents from the ".map" files. Exits the program if error of duplicate continents is found.
        Parameters:
        p_reader - Stream starting from continents section of ".map" file
        Returns:
        p_reader BufferedReader stream at the point where it has finished reading continents

      • readBorders

        private java.io.BufferedReader readBorders(java.io.BufferedReader p_reader)
        Reads the borders from the ".map" files. Exits the programming error if attempted to add invalid neighbor or to an invalid country.
        Parameters:
        p_reader -
        Returns:
        p_reader

      • addNeighbour

        private void addNeighbour(CountryDetails p_argumentCountry,
                          java.lang.String p_stringIndex)
        Registers the country at argument 'stringIndex' with the argumentCountry. Exits the programming throwing error if invalid neighbor is found
        Parameters:
        p_argumentCountry - Country to which neighbor is to be registered.
        p_stringIndex - Index of the country to be added as a neighbor to the argument country

      • addToContinentMap

        private void addToContinentMap(CountryDetails l_newCountry)
        Registers this new country as part of its continent. If duplicate country, exits the program throwing error.
        Parameters:
        l_newCountry -
